https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/o0IN9zqZD6lsqDXbzEtIX7EwK9a.jpg Ram, a London-based businessman of Indian and English descent, has been experiencing mind-shattering nightmares of a mysterious masked woman who torments him. As Ram mourns the loss of his father, he is assaulted with images, seemingly lost memories for which he has no explanation. Broken Thread
